On.Send: AnimBracketStart Work Stand,Work,Start Stand,Work Stand,Work,End ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever
AnimBracketStart Work Stand,Work,Start Stand,Work Stand,Work,End ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever,Instant

HostSiteOps.Ops: SOpAttachInternalDetonation SOpForwardCasterCenter SOpRotVariancerForward60 SOpMoveByDot15ToDot5 SOpMoveDownByDot15ToDot25 SOpPointSouthWorld

On.Send: AnimBracketStart Work Stand,Work,Start Stand,Work Stand,Work,End ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever
AnimBracketStart Work Stand,Work,Start Stand,Work Stand,Work,End ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever,Instant

Remove.Send: AnimBracketStart BSD Birth Stand Death ContentPlayOnce

On.Send: AnimBracketStart BSD Birth Stand Death ContentPlayOnce 0.500000 AsDuration

On.Send: AnimBracketStart Work Stand,Work,Start Stand,Work Stand,Work,End ClosingFull
AnimBracketStart Work Stand,Work,Start Stand,Work Stand,Work,End ClosingFull

HostSiteOps.Ops: SOpForwardLaunchGuide SOp2DRotation SOp180 SOpRotVariancerUp35 SOpPointDown1ByDot25 SOpRotationRandomPitch30
SOpAttachCenter SOpForwardCasterCenter SOpRotVariancerForward60 SOpMoveByDot5To1 SOpMoveDownByDot25ToDot75 SOpPointSouthWorld

On.Send: AnimBracketStart Burrow Burrow IGNORE Unburrow ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever,Instant
AnimBracketStart Spawn Stand Stand,Work Death ContentPlayOnce,Instant

HostSiteOps.Ops: SOpAttachHead SOpShadow SOpForwardCasterCenterInverted SOp2DRotation SOpMoveByDot3 SOpSplashDamagePositionVariance SOpRollClockwise90
